reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its soft, substantial fabric. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it looks more expensive in person, while another mentions it's pink but not overwhelming. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small, and similarly, opinions vary on the length, with some finding it good while others say it's not as long as shown. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress, flattering.
items.body: Love it. I am 5‚Äô 2‚Äù tall, 130#, 34 D with a bit of a mommy pooch and I love how this dress fits. It‚Äôs a pull over your head dress but thanks to the elastic waist it is manageable. The loose fabric below the gathered waist was flattering to my tummy. The color is exactly as expected despite how it looks black in one picture, it truly is blue. Works great with my cowboy boots. Cotton outside, polyester liner. Super comfy. Could easily add a belt to cover the elastic waist, but the gathered waist is beautiful. Washing it now on delicate so hopefully it washes well. Read more
items.author: Mtn. Girl 420

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Dress!
items.body: Comfortable fit but a little long for me 5‚Äô4‚Äù; but great value for the money. Great style for the upcoming holidays and can add a scarf, or pashmina to change up the look. Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It‚Äôs not stylish like the photos
items.body: It‚Äôs a decent dress but I don‚Äôt think I can wear it‚Äî it looks like an extremely modest and outdated dress once you put it on. It‚Äôs honestly pretty but I don‚Äôt see myself (or anyone) wearing it in public. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute and Great Quality
items.body: This dress is super cute and fits really well. I was honestly impressed with the quality of the material. It feels nice and not cheap at all. It‚Äôs comfortable, flattering, and easy to dress up or wear more casually. I‚Äôm really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Camille Tusler

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Love the color and fits great. Read more
items.author: Gayle Green

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the look I was going for
items.body: The material was good, not see through but not thick material either and had a cute print on it. There is a base layer which is nice. The sizing seemed fine but I looked like I belonged with an Amish family and it wasn‚Äôt the look I was going for. Did not fit me the same or any where near as cute as the model. Which I get can be the case. Just didn‚Äôt turn out for me. Read more
items.author: MLS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!
items.body: This is a gorgeous dress. The fabric breathes well it doesn‚Äôt cling to you. The length was as pictured, which was a pleasant surprise. The color is as pictured and is gorgeous. It held up well after being washed as well. I‚Äôve gotten a lot of compliments on it and even got the cream colored one for our family pictures. It isn‚Äôt see-through, the fabric seems to be good quality. I feel like it can be dressed up or worn casually. I am 5‚Äô6 and weigh 250 pounds and in postpartum; the XXL fit me perfectly. I have an apron belly but the dress didn‚Äôt show it. Read more
items.author: Markie jones

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a bit of a chore to iron
items.body: I loved the color and the look of this dress it is a bit of a chore to get it wrinkle free the length is good and it was true to size Read more
items.author: joan locey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Malachite Green, Brilliant Blue, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Army Green, Sage Green, Black, Brown Red, Orange, Brown Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
